scripts.start: rm -rf docs/* && cp -r src/* data/* images/* docs/ && cp src/index.html docs/.htm && sort-json *.json */*.json; prettier --write src *.json */*.json && (tsc || echo "type errors oh no") && prettier --write docs && git add . && echo 'done. enabling tsc --watch in 10 seconds.' && sleep 10 && tsc --watch
